Crimmzy.
-Check your permission settings under the 'security' tab in the appropriate folder.
-Run the Keygen with administrator rights.
-Disable your anti-virus (is you have it).

@ zzw1983
I already tryed that, I'm using Vista 64bit if that helps.

Crimzzy, its probably your anti virus, i had that problem on various other cracks before. If you still have that problem when turning your anti virus off, completely shut it down/uninstall it and it will work.
Can't get the fuckin thing to work. Did everything mentioned here but that fucking activation keeps saying it failed, wrong serial. Fuck it !

coolguy.

uninstall everything and clean the registry and try it in these steps.

-Install game
-use keygen to generate serial for installation
-install aerosoft launcher
-run aerosoft launcher
-disable your internet
-copy the local key into the keygen and generate a proper key.
-activate the game
-install the patch
-enable your internet
-run aerosoft launcher again and enter the local key into the keygen (make sure your email and serials are the same as the 1st time)
-enter the proper key 
-activate

These are the exact steps I used and it works. I installed the game on a separate drive and installed aerosoft launcher in the default location. Everything works.

Hope this helps. Keep us posted.
dont forget to click 'OFFLINE MODE' in aerosoft launcher to activate. This doesn't necessarily mean you HAVE to disable your internet.

There is a virus in the key-gen:

6/17/2011 8:22:53 PM	Kaspersky Internet Security	Protection Center	Untreated: HEUR:Trojan.Win32.Generic			
j:\crack\keygen.exe

dc8910: try reactivating. If that doesn't work. Try the steps I described in my previous post.

Tom92: I have no problems with it in Windows 7. Maybe XP is the problem? Try running it as an administrator. Are you running XP 64bit?

laurentziu1993: It is found under 'offline activation' in Aerosoft launcher.

Blind Pew : Google 'false positive'. Your antivirus is recognizing the keygen as a virus in an effort to curb piracy. It is not a virus. Your anti-virus was made to detect keygens as viruses.
